head.title: COVID 19 Emotional Health Resources - Waterloo School District

meta.content:
We as a Pupil Services team are here to support your health and well being during this school closure. It is important to take care of yourself and your family. Visit the For Families>COVID 19 Emotional Health tab for resources and tips from your counselors to stay happy and healthy during this time.
Note other links under the For Families tab for food banks, health resources, and income related resources, also.
